name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 144
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, For A Nuclear Holocaust. Russia has, against international law, invaded the Ukraine and started the first European land war since 2014. Russia’s army was quickly humiliated as the far smaller, less funded Ukrainian army, consisting of many everyday civilians, held back wave after wave of Russian troops. And while Russia will undoubtedly eventually overtake Ukrainian forces, international sanctions have demolished Russias economy, halving the value of the rubble and wiping nearly 300billion USD worth of money. In response Putin has put Russia’s nuclear deterrent forces on high alert, and many fear military action against Russia in the name of Ukraine could lead to all out nuclear war. With Putin seemingly unhinged and possibly mentally unstable it seems that like the only thing that could prevent this catastrophe is someone from within his circle finally taking him out. I STAND WITH UKRAINE. I STAND AGAINST PUTIN.
